topic.title: Messing arround
topic.body:
Really enjoying Zeronet so far
Better than TOR as far as speed and looks are concerned that's for sure :^)

1603894128_1JV9baqEPCwXcpw8YUJGNDvLJWhi2.body: You should be fine with any ubuntu based distro, but if you are trying to squeeze as much performance as possible and still have a nice looking UI i would strongly recomend Peppermint OS 10 or Lubuntu

that being said, the Peppermint devs are close to releasing a new version, so i would wait a bit if i were you

Good luck
